post:
Hi there,

Like it has been done on SYS, we made a "free setup fees" offer on Kimsufi. Technically it will be only released tomorrow, it's a pre-sale let's say :)

It concerns the whole dedicated server range, for each 6/12 months commitment. 

**End date: 30th October**

=> Choose "Bi-annual" / "Yearly" as Payment frequency 

I know some of you wanted flash sale, it will come at some point :)

Feedbacks are (very) welcome here.

Thanks !
